body_html:
TF does not pin threads to cores (though if you build with MKL, I believe that Intel's internal thread pool implementation does (and probably makes use of hyperthreads if it makes sense.

Thanks for your question, but please ask these types of questions on Stackoverflow...

body:
TF does not pin threads to cores (though if you build with MKL, I believe that Intel's internal thread pool implementation does (and probably makes use of hyperthreads if it makes sense.

Thanks for your question, but please ask these types of questions on Stackoverflow...
